entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
